attributes.action: Ban taxes on women's sanitary products & make them free for people on low income
attributes.background: Rhianna Malone's Facebook status states how much money women are spending per year because they have to, not because they want to. Sanitary products are something that women NEED, they are not a 'luxury' item. Tampons & pads should be organic as they contain unnecessary, dangerous ingredients.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105172
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106063

If you would like to focus on your request for free sanitary products for women on low incomes, you could start a petition specifically about that.
